item.title: [RQUEST HELP] Adding/Moving/Removing Objects - Nothing Works? [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ZinG1337 ZinG1337
item.description:
@ZinG1337 wrote:

Hello Fellow Helpers -

Base - Project Insainty [Massacred]

Ive Encounterd A Problem Whilest Moving/Removing/Adding Items.

Firstly I’ll Start By The Method Im Using…

I Go Into

MyServer.Src.Server.World.ObjectManager.java

Then I Go To My Code The Current Code It

private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(26792, 3100, 3505, 3, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(17010, 3103, 3508, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4874, 3089, 3496, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 3089, 3494, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4876, 3091, 3493, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4877, 3097, 3505, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4878, 3094, 3505, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3850, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3849, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10308, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10311, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10312, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10341, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10342, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3096, 3500, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(24343, 3091, 3506, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3047, 9779, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3080, 9502, 1, 10); //c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3192, 3086, 3485, -1, 10); //scoreboard c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1530, 3093, 3486, 1, 10); if (c.heightLevel == 0) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); else c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); }

After That I Edit /Remove A Few Things.

private int[][] customObjects = {{}}; public void loadCustomSpawns(Client c) { THIS LINE IS EDITEDc.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(26792, 3505, 3505, 3, 10);[/color] c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(17010, 3103, 3508, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4874, 3089, 3496, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4875, 3089, 3494, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4876, 3091, 3493, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4877, 3097, 3505, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4878, 3094, 3505, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3850, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3849, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10308, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10311, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10312, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10341, -1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10342, 1, 0); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6552, 3096, 3500, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(24343, 3091, 3506, 0, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3047, 9779, 1, 10); c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3080, 9502, 1, 10); //c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3192, 3086, 3485, -1, 10); //scoreboard c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1530, 3093, 3486, 1, 10); if (c.heightLevel == 0) c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2492, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); else c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2911, 3614, 1, 10); }

The Line In RED Has Been Edited, So After That I ‘Save’.

So After Saving The Line I Edited Is This THIS LINE IS EDITEDc.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(26792, 3505, 3505, 3, 10);[/color] Just moved were it will spawn
Complie, All A-OK.
I Then Re-Run The Server -

I Then Do ::MyPos 3505 3505

Its Takes Me There, And Nothing Has Moved -

I’m Not Around A Soultion After Tryying For 2 Hours -

I Mean Seriousley - It Can’t Be Rocket Sience.

Im Learning Java, - I Already Know C++ & D3D

What Could Be Casuing This Issue?

NOTICE : Sorry For Spelling Its 6AM In The Morning & Dodgey Keyboard.
NOTICE : Sorry For CAPS At Start Of All Letters, VERY BAD HABBIT.

Please Help With The Issue

Regaurds - ZinG
